Question
========
What is a recommended way to start a new Positron project that will use Git/GitHub?

Answerlist
----------
* Create the repo on GitHub, then use `New Folder from Git` in Positron to clone it
* Write code directly in the Downloads folder with no version control
* Only use the Julia REPL without saving any files
* Copy random files into a temporary folder every time you work

Solution
========
Cloning a freshly created GitHub repo into Positron sets up a clean project folder that is ready for version control.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
